title: Air crew
creator_credit: Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau and Geoffrey Thompson
brief_description: The training of pilots and navigators for careers in the Royal Australian Air Force is described in detail. Young men with strong mathematical aptitudes excel in these fields, especially navigation. Training is carried out in a number of RAAF schools in different parts of the Commonwealth. The film closes with an account of life on the Australian base at Butterworth in Malaya.
